elements.name: User should be able to select product in alphabetical order

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to desktop tab
I click on show all desktops
I select sortby descending position "Name Z to A"
verify the Product will arrange in Descending order

elements.name: User should be able to add product to shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to desktop tab
I click on show all desktops
I select sortby ascending position "Name (A - Z)"
I select product "HP LP3065"
Verify the HP Text "HP LP3065"
I Select Delivery Date "2023-01-30"
I Enter Qty "1" using Select class
I Click on Add to Cart button
Verify the Message "Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!

steps.name: I Click on link shopping cart display into success message
Verify the text "Shopping Cart"
Verify the Product name "HP LP3065"
Verify the Delivery Date "Delivery Date: 2023-01-30"
Verify the Model "Product 21"
Verify the Todat "£74.73"

name: Desktop Page Test
description: as a user I want to arrange products and add to shopping cart

elements.name: User should navigate to desktop page successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to desktop tab
I click on show all desktops
verify desktop text message

elements.name: User should navigate to laptop and notebooks page successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to laptop and desktop tab
I click on show all laptop and notebooks
verify laptop and notebooks text

elements.name: User should navigate to components page successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to component tab
I click on show all components
verify components text

name: Home Page Test
description: as a user I want to navigate to tabs

elements.name: User should able to display product price high to low

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to laptop and desktop tab
I click on show all laptop and notebooks
I select Sort By "Price (High > Low)"
Verify the Product price will arrange in High to Low order

elements.name: User should be able to place order successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover to laptop and desktop tab
I click on show all laptop and notebooks
I select Sort By "Price (High > Low)"
Select Product "MacBook"
Verify the text "MacBook"
I Click on ‘Add To Cart’ button
Verify the message "Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!

steps.name: I Click on link “shopping cart” display into success message
Verify the text after adding "Shopping Cart"
Verify the Product name after adding "MacBook"
I Change Quantity "2"
I Click on “Update” Tab
Verify the message "Success: You have modified your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have modified your shopping cart!

steps.name: Verify the Total "£737.45"
I Click on “Checkout” button
Verify the text "Checkout"
Verify the Text "New Customer"
I Click on Guest Checkout radio button
I Click on Continue tab
I Fill the mandatory fields
I Click on Continue Button
I Add Comments About your order into text area
I Check the Terms & Conditions check box
I Click on Continue button again
Verify the lastMessage "Warning: Payment method required!"

name: Laptops and notebooks Test
description: as a user I want to place order successfully

elements.name: User should navigate to Register page successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I Click on My Account link
I call method 'SelectMyAccountOptions' and pass the parameter "Register"
Verify the register text "Register Account"

elements.name: User should navigate to Login page successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I Click on My Account link
I call method 'SelectMyAccountOptions' and pass the parameter as "Login"
Verify the returning text "Returning Customer"

elements.name: User should be able to Register Account Successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I Click on My Account link
I call method 'SelectMyAccountOptions' and pass the parameter "Register"
I Enter First Name
I Enter Last Name
I Enter Email
I Enter Telephone
I Enter Password
I Enter Password Confirm
I Select Subscribe Yes radio button
I Click on Privacy Policy check box
I Click on after privacy Continue button
I Verify the message "Your Account Has Been Created!"
I Click on after message Continue button
I Click on My Account link
I Call the method 'selectMyAccountOptions' method and pass the parameter "Logout"
Verify the account logout text "Account Logout"
I Click on after logout Continue button

elements.name: User should be able to login and logout successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I Click on My Account link
I call method 'SelectMyAccountOptions' and pass the parameter "Login"
I Enter Email address
I Enter Last Name
I Enter Password
I Click on Login button
Verify text "My Account"
I Click on My Account link
I Call the method 'selectMyAccountOptions' method and pass the parameter "Logout"
Verify the account logout text "Account Logout"
I Click on after logout Continue button

name: my accounts Test
description: as a user I want to register and log in successfully
